column4: Hey guys, any ideas why flash videos have suddenly stopped working for me, in terms of sound. Video is fine, but no sound plays at all. I have played around with the ALSA Mixer (Kudos for the new interface for that) but nothing seems to work. All other sound seems to be fine

Also, I would like to know if it is possible for me to, somehow, run ActiveSync with a Windows Mobile run smartphone on Linux. At the moment, my second computer still has Windows on it for that sole purpose, and I want rid of Microsoft.
